lumis.portal.bigdata

Interface IBigDataIndexer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBatchIndexer, IBigDataRepository, IBigDataRepositorySPI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElasticsearchRepository

    @StableMinor(version="8.1",
             sinceVersion="8.1")
public interface IBigDataIndexer
    Provides big data indexing operations.
    These operations may be asynchronous. Hence, the result of add and delete actions may not be available just after the action has been called. Also, there's no guarantee the requested actions will, indeed, be succeeded.
    Since:
    8.1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 17593 $ $Date: 2015-07-17 11:21:36 -0300 (Fri, 17 Jul 2015) $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDocument(Document document)
      Adds a content to the index.
      void deleteDocumentsByFieldValue(String fieldId, Collection<Object> values)
      Deletes contents that are matched by one of the given values in the field of given field identifier.
      void deleteDocumentsByFieldValue(String fieldId, Object... values)
      Deletes contents that are matched by one of the given values in the field of given field identifier.
      void deleteDocumentsByQuery(SearchQuery searchQuery)
      Deletes contents that are matched by the given search query.
      The search query's sorts, initial hit and maximum hit count will be ignored.
